alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Laurens; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 7:50AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Laurens, southeastern Wilkinson, southwestern Washington and western Johnson Counties through 815 AM EDT... At 749 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Nicklesville, or 9 miles southeast of Irwinton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Wrightsville, East Dublin, Tennille, Harrison, Toomsboro, Oconee, Spann, Donovan, Tuckers Crossroad, Nicklesville, Lovett, Chappells Mill and Brewton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
